column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " We have to go after that ship , Sokka .
#Text=If we do n't help him , no one will .
#Text=I know you do n't like Aang , but we owe him and -- " Sokka says : " Katara !
#Text=Are you gon na talk all day , or are you comin ' with me ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Get in , we 're going to save your boyfriend .
#Text=" Katara says : " He 's not my -- " Sokka says : " Whatever .
#Text=" Kanna says : " What do you two think you 're doing ?
#Text=" Kanna says : " You 'll need these .
#Text=You have a long journey ahead of you .
#Text=It 's been so long since I 've had hope , but you brought it back to life , my little waterbender .
#Text=And you , my brave warrior , be nice to your sister .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , okay Gran .
#Text=" Kanna says : " Aang is the Avatar .
#Text=He 's the world 's only chance .
#Text=You both found him for a reason .
#Text=Now your destinies are intertwined with his .
#Text=" Katara says : " There 's no way we 're going to catch a warship with a canoe .
#Text=" Katara says : " Appa !
#Text=" Sokka says : " You just looove taking me out of my comfort zone , do n't you ?
#Text="
